title: S-Class Except Me - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Dungeons   Famous Parents   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Hunters   Modern Day   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Overprotective Siblings   Protagonist Strong from the Start
author: 젤리구미베어
description:
I heard that it's hard to see S-class hunters in my life, but all my family members are S-class!
A celebrity family who is more famous than other celebrities, that is my house.
Except for me, Jung Haeun, who is 100% civilian and not even registered as a hunter.

People say that I'm the ugly duckling, but I'm actually quite comfortable and I like it.
I'm enjoying my life as a rich and unemployed person.

Of course, there are facts that the world, even my family members, do not know.

[The constellation 'The Mutant of the Abyss’ is whining: please, let's debut.]
[As soon as Haeun debut, it shouted that she would be the world's No. 0 poker face.]
'I don't want to. It's annoying. I’m perfectly fine being treated like a civilian.'

That I am the only EX-class in the world.
I am living a hard life because of my private circumstances.
I want to live forever drinking honey like this.
But…

[‘The Mutant of the Abyss’ will make Haeun debut no matter what.]

I've been avoiding my debut path well, but somehow the situation is ominous these days.
>
